text: Swedish siblings win gold in Olympics mixed doubles curling - ESPN

text: Earth’s core may contain as much as 45 oceans’ worth of hydrogen, scientists find - cnn.com
fullText: As much as 45 oceans’ worth of hydrogen may be in Earth’s core, scientists reported, suggesting most of Earth’s water was acquired during the planet’s formation.
